name: Storageville
description:
One of Storageville's Warehouse District's Central Precinct's most famed warehouses just got some new job openings, and it needs someone with passion, energy, and a love for boxes to fill in the position!

Set in an large, detailed warehouse environment with advanced visual effects which impact the gameplay experience and revolutionary new mechanics incorporating QR codes, Storageville Central Warehouse strives for realism and authenticity for the warehouse shelf stacking video game market. It is the long awaited game for warehouse lovers and shelving enthusiasts around the world, giving you the chance to connect with players through the multiplayer modes and earn your way to warehouse fame!

Take on the role of a Storageville Central Warehouse employee as you get into some action packed storage mayhem with your friends. Download now for unlimited boxes.
